models.classes

Class King

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.classes.King

  • public class King
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents a King in the Game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      King(PlayerColor color)
      Creates a King with the specified PlayerColor.

    • Method Summary

      Sets the PlayerColor of the King.

        public PlayerColor getColor()

        Parameters:

      • getKingView

        public KingView getKingView()
        Get the KingView of the King.
        Returns:
        if the view was not created, a new instance of KingView. if the view was already created, the associated instance of KingView.
        See Also:
        KingView

      • setKingView

        public void setKingView(KingView kingView)
        Associates a KingView to the King.
        Parameters:
        kingView - KingView to be associated to the King.

      • isPlaced

        public boolean isPlaced()
        Returns if the King is placed on a Domino.
        Returns:
        true if the King is placed on a Domino. false otherwise.

      • setPlaced

        public void setPlaced(boolean placed)
        Sets if the King is placed on a Domino.
        Parameters:
        placed - Boolean defining if the King is placed on a Domino.
